Articles.Content: Rep loaded! Fire!
*Places self in front of GIC as human shield for rep*

*Places self in front of GIC as human shield for rep*

Ha! Our rep hitting you will only enable us to spread more rep to Green Iron Crown!
We must protect Green Iron Crown at all costs! If he falls to the red side, this whole operation will be destroyed!
Perhaps someone should create some dummy accounts to reload rep with, and then have the mods delete them when this is over with, that we we can slam GIC without compromising our standards

ya'll rep .....s.

Hmm, another banned word. :/
Yeah! He is down to his last dark red rep bar!

Perhaps someone should create some dummy accounts to reload rep with, and then have the mods delete them when this is over with, that we we can slam GIC without compromising our standards

But no-one would actually do that, would they? After all, it breaks the community rules:

4.3 One user per account, one account per user

Only one person may use an account, and one person may only create one account on the forums.
Heheheh, you need to break the rules to defeat me?
The only rule we break is the submission you demand!

I will rule you with an iron fist, all your posts will be moderated, no quote or coub will will blemish these forums again, enjoy your irreverence while it lasts peon.

I will bring order to these pages.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹(Does anyone have an aspirin?)
You're just an unpleasant person, Green.

-584 points left.

I'm out for a while. Managed a few hits a few hours ago, still can't give out any more rep.
Perhaps he is ready to talk now. Who summoned you, demon?
That's enough spamming now Kenbob, your post is deleted, but you know what I'm talking about

As far as I know, noone has acknowledged it.

'Cept for you
We all want to keep up the game, now stay on topic please, GIC must perish!
Awesome, moderators fooling around, and abusing their power for no reason. Just what this forum needs.
Everyone can have a bit of fun with this GIC thing, even you RaS

But no-one would actually do that, would they? After all, it breaks the community rules:

Heheheh, you need to break the rules to defeat me?

No, It doesn't exactly break the rules, as the account would belong to no one, and it would deleted as soon as GIC is defeated.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

However, after a bit of thought, I realized that we don't need to create fake accounts. We don't need to slather every post on this thread with rep, regardless of whether or not that post deserves it. We are part of a wonderful community, with many people that deserve reputation points. Need an example? Go over to the add-on dev and release sections, the craft sharing sections, or some even the main discussion section. You will see an abundance of wonderful people doing an abundance of wonderful things. If find yourself needing to "reload", go and rep some of those people, instead of dumping it at the first place you can find. We don't need to resort to cheap tactics to win this. We can do this as a community, all working together (with a few exceptions) to take down a fowl user who threatens the sanctity of our forums.

Let's do this.

Edited January 22, 2015 by temporalExile
Exactly. I haven't wasted a single ounce of rep on someone who I felt did not deserve it, for some reason or other.
Why do people even friend him if he is going to die soon? I wonder... I wonder if there is a deeper plot here somewhere. *CONSPIRACY THEORIST MODE ACTIVE*

But no-one would actually do that, would they? After all, it breaks the community rules:

Lets be honest here . . . yes we would.

In the name of Red Iron Crown, we would totally use smurf accounts to defeat Green Iron Crown.

- - - Updated - - -

I'm overloaded, but the pariah is down to 564 -rep. We are closing in on stripping him of the dark red! 64 more points do it (that should be 13 more full-strength hits and he loses the dark red)!
You (Pant) will never (Wheeze) break (Cough) me!
Did you just run up like seventeen floors of stairs to write that comment? Or do you have asthma? I have an inhaler if you want one...
